• View On GitHub

    • F-Flat

    F♭ (pronounced F-flat) is a toy language.

    Project maintained by Hypercubed Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by mattgraham

    Internal Flags

    [src]

    set-system-property

    sets a system level flag

    • flags: 'auto-undo', 'log-level', 'decimal-precision'

    str a ->

    f♭> 'log-level' 'trace' set-system-property
[ ]
    [src]

    get-system-property

    gets a system level flag

    • flags: 'auto-undo', 'log-level', 'decimal-precision'

    str -> a

    f♭> 'log-level' get-system-property
[ 'warn' ]
    [src]
